attributes.action: Allow students to go to the bathroom in school and lesson
attributes.additional_details: We are young it has been scientific proven that Holding your urine for too long can weaken the bladder muscles over time. This can lead to problems such as incontinence and not being able to fully empty your bladder. Holding your urine for extremely long periods of time can also cause urinary tract infections due to bacteria build-up.
attributes.background: We think it is unfair that students are not allowed to go to the bathroom during lesson time

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.

This is a matter for individual schools and teachers. Decisions on policies regarding when students can leave the classroom are a matter for individual schools, not the UK Government or House of Commons.
